    • Constructor Detail

      • PostAlertGroup

        public PostAlertGroup(java.lang.String postTextMessage,
                      java.util.List<Post> similarPostsFromThisGroup)
        Create a group of similar posts generated by a post search in Apache Lucene. Is required the groupdId from this group, the post message that generate this group and a file name to store informations from this group.
        Parameters:
        postTextMessage - - Post message that was used to generate this group.
        similarPOstsFromThisGroup - - List with posts that compose this group.
